title: Is Caitlyn a good late game adc?

replies.body: Every adc is a late game adc.
imo yes she is really strong laning and late game for her control and headshot damage.

Ah ok, That's what i thought.  lvl 3 taking half an opponents life with one AA seems strong during laning... and her late game seemed strong.  When is she weak? or is it one of those things where she's weak in the mindset that everyone is weak?  If you CC them for a day, they die.
technically her mid game is poor, but her strong early game can set the other adc back.

Caitlyn is strong early-game and late-game due to her safety, range and siege potential.

She is comparatively weak in the mid-game due to her lack of steroids and ability damage.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=PgrcOuqn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-27T02:49:17.810+0000)
>
> Caitlyn is strong early-game and late-game due to her safety, range and siege potential.
> 
> She is comparatively weak in the mid-game due to her lack of steroids and ability damage.

{{champion:119}} Would like a word with you.
she's the most broken adc late game. once she's full build and she has shields and peel, it's done.

Compared to tristana and vayne she isnt the most broken adc late game


She is better then average in late game not broken


Caitlynn sucks in midgame though
